title: Loving Hut - Westfield Mall Food Emporium
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and vegan desserts. Menu includes various appetizers, noodle dishes, salads, sandwiches, and buffet combo specials. It's downstairs in the mall food court.
